pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Smallest enclosing circle`pip install smallestenclosingcircle````` pythonimport smallestenclosingcirclecenter_x, center_y, radius = smallestenclosingcircle.make_circle(points)# points must be iterable of points e.g.: # numpy array of shape (N, 2)# list of tuples# [(1, 2), (8, 9), (4, 5), (-6, -7), ... ]## Note: if no points are input, returns None````Original source from: https://www.nayuki.io/page/smallest-enclosing-circle
